response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me and represents a unique offering in its market. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between my valuation and what you perceive as the product's worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. I believe this is an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
